Interface DirectoryItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Directory, Drive

    public interface DirectoryItem
    Directory Action Drive or Directory implements this interface

        Create directory in current DriveType, and return this directory instance.

        This function is effective only when state of Client is "logined".

        Parameters:
        path - Directory path
        Returns:
        Return Directory instance Sync method

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Directory> getDirectory(java.lang.String path)

        This function is effective only when state of Client is "logined".

        If the directory does not exist, an exception is thrown
        Parameters:
